headline: Mag 7 plus Oracle equals GAMMATON! Strategist talks tech acronym.
summary: What do you get when you add one more Big Tech stock to the Magnificent Seven? The answer is GAMMATON! Interactive Brokers chief strategist Steve Sosnick explains his newest acronym for prospective AI and tech picks, GAMMATON, which consists of Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG), Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), Meta Platforms (META), Amazon (AMZN), Tesla (TSLA), Oracle (ORCL), and Nvidia (NVDA). Also hear Steve Sosnick elaborate on whether AI investors should pivot from Nvidia (NVDA) into Oracle after the latter's colossal stock gain this week.
